      • configure

        public static <T> Escher2Standard<T> configure(Escher2Standard<T> converter,
                                               de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
        This configures the generic Escher2Standard and sets the common layout options.
        Parameters:
        converter - The converter to configure.
        properties - Command line options, to configure the converter with.
        Returns:
        Returns the configured converter.

      • convert

        public static <T> T convert(EscherMap map,
                            java.lang.Class<? extends T> format,
                            de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
        Generic method which converts the given EscherMap instance to the specified generic parameter format, by calling the corresponding converter.
        Parameters:
        map - EscherMap instance to convert.
        format - Output format to convert to.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Returns:
        An instance of format type created from the escher map.

      • convert

        public static EscherMap convert(org.sbgn.bindings.Sbgn document,
                                de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
        Calls SBGN-ML to Escher converter. See SBGN2Escher.
        Parameters:
        document - SBGN-ML (Sbgn) document to convert.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Returns:
        The exported EscherMap instance.

      • convert

        public static java.util.List<EscherMap> convert(org.sbml.jsbml.SBMLDocument document,
                                                de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
        Calls SBML Layout Extension to Escher converter. See SBML2Escher.
        Parameters:
        document - SBMLDocument to convert.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Returns:
        A list of EscherMap extracted from the SBML file, as there may be more than one.

      • convert

        public static <T> T convert(java.io.File input,
                            java.lang.Class<? extends T> format,
                            de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Converts given JSON input to given output format. Simply calls the convert(EscherMap, Class, SBProperties) with the parsed JSON.
        Parameters:
        input - JSON file which has an EscherMap.
        format - Output format to convert to.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Returns:
        An instance of format type created from the escher map.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are problems in reading the input file.
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Thrown if the JSON in input file is invalid.

      • parseEscherJson

        public static EscherMap parseEscherJson(java.io.File input)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Parses given JSON file into an EscherMap instance using Jackson.
        Parameters:
        input - The File to parse.
        Returns:
        The EscherMap instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are problems in reading the input file.

      • batchProcess

        public void batchProcess(java.io.File input,
                         java.io.File output,
                         de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
                  throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                         javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                         java.io.IOException,
                         javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                         javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                         org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                         javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Convert files one by one by calling the convert(File, File, SBProperties) recursively. Only called once if single file.
        Parameters:
        input - Single file or input directory to convert from.
        output - Single file or output directory to convert to.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are problems in reading the input file(s).
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing JSON file(s).
        org.sbml.jsbml.SBMLException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).

      • convert

        public void convert(java.io.File input,
                    java.io.File output,
                    de.zbit.util.prefs.SBProperties properties)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                    javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                    org.sbml.jsbml.SBMLException,
                    javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                    org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                    javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Called by batchProcess(File, File, SBProperties) for every file. Calls the appropriate overloads.
        Parameters:
        input - Input (single) File.
        output - Output (single) File.
        properties - Command line options, if any.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are problems in reading the input file(s).
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing JSON file(s).
        org.sbml.jsbml.SBMLException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).

      • extractCobraModel

        public static boolean extractCobraModel(java.io.File file)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Extracts CoBRA from SBMLDocument if it is FBC compliant. cobrapy must be present for this.
        Parameters:
        file - Input file.
        Returns:
        Result of extraction.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are problems in reading the input file(s).
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - Thrown if there are problems in parsing XML file(s).
